metadata.synopsis: Reaction after Arabella, a tiefling child, is killed by the druid Kagha's serpent in the grove. Requires two speakers.Speaker 1 is the character who was in the dialog and had opportunity to stop it. (May have tried and failed or simply refrained from acting)Speaker 2 is an accompanying character, they may have an opinionated line regarding the outcome according to their own beliefs.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: The snake killed that girl in front of everyone. Is this grove worth a dead child?

1.speaker: Player
1.text: The longer we stay here, the closer we come to reaching the same fate.
1.context: NodeContext: Karlach just watched some druids accidentally kill a tiefling girl. She's stunned.
